page.title: 04AUDLEY END STATION
page.content: Audley End station is situated on the main{railway}line from{LONDON to{CAMBRIDGE.}The station is about 100 years old,apart from the parcel block which has been added more recently. On a weekday about 800{commuters}and 1000 passengers make use of the station.There are three staff that work at the station.These are two porters and one ticket clerk. The station itself is clean and even has hanging baskets full of flowers.There is no litter,and bins are provided.On average,about 30 {trains}stop at Audley End station every day of the week.There is a regular bus service which connects the surrounding villages.The latest addition to the station is an extension to the{car {park}costing nearly Â£200,000.
